Observing the body in this way, following along and being mindful. If one is mindful in this way, then one will not be attached to external objects such as forms, sounds, smells, tastes, and tactile objects.
First, contemplate the eyes and forms, and see the eyes as they are. They are just flesh balls, composed of the four great elements.

Observing the wind element within as it truly is, observing the ears, nose, tongue, and body in accordance with this is also like this. Having observed in this way, one does not give rise to attachment to pleasant forms, and is not destroyed by objects of desire.
Furthermore, the practitioner observes the body in the body internally.

This body is momentary arising and ceasing, birth, old age, sickness, and death. This body is like an illusion, empty and non-existent, without reality or solidity, like water bubbles. It is a place where various sufferings gather, the basis of various sufferings, a treasury of various sufferings. In this body, there is not the slightest bit of pleasure. What kinds of worms are there?

He uses heard wisdom or the divine eye to

He contemplates the saliva worms that can digest saliva, causing either illness or well-being.

How does it cause people to be comfortable or sick?

When a person eats, this worm jumps up from the ten channels to the throat, causing the person to vomit and giving rise to five kinds of vomiting.

second, semen vomiting;

If the worm is comfortable, the food is then regulated and enters the stomach.

How do the vomiting worms cause people to vomit phlegm?

Having contemplated the vomiting worms, one accurately understands the body.
Furthermore, the practitioner contemplates the internal body, following the body in contemplation.
How do the vomiting worms cause people to vomit saliva?

Furthermore, the practitioner observes the internal body, attending to it closely.
